reviewText: This is one of the most hilarious comedy routines I have ever watched. Richard Jeni was absolutely fantastic and almost all of this stuff is relatable.  His timing and punchlines were perfect for this show.
Absolutely love it!  No other stand up routine has stuck in my mind like this one.  My brother and mom and I still share laughs over this.
One of the funniest people my wife and I have ever had the pleasure of laughing with. We miss him very much since his tragic death.
